[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv, dqc_0129.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - D:\Temp\tmpfufuqaos\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0153.9879] The hypercube us-gaap:StatementTable appears in the statement 0000008 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Cash Flows. Only a single hypercube should be used in the face financial statements and it should include all monetary items. This hypercube excludes the following monetary concepts us-gaap:StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions, us-gaap:BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedLiabilities, us-gaap:RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOperatingLeaseLiability, us-gaap:IncomeTaxesPaid, us-gaap:OperatingLeaseLiability, us-gaap:InterestPaidNet, us-gaap:BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedAssets, indb:CapitalcommitmentrelatingtoLowIncomeHousingProjectinvestmentsnoncash, us-gaap:OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.
The hypercube should be a child of an abstract concept and should have the primary monetary concepts as decendants.
Rule Element Id:9879 Rule version: 21.0.0 -
